verbose_text: Here, ATX inhibition decreased the first EPSC (eEPSC1) corroborating the presynaptic action of synaptic LPA and supporting the idea that higher synaptic LPA levels increase presynaptic release probability and impair thereby short-term presynaptic plasticity.
evidence: ATX inhibition decreased the first EPSC (eEPSC1) corroborating the presynaptic action of synaptic LPA
